title: Task Analysis
content: The spreadsheet_specialist tool failed. I will now try to use the document_specialist tool. Since the document_specialist tool can only handle .txt, .md, .pdf, and .docx files, I will first need to convert the excel file to a pdf file. Then I will use the document_specialist to format the pdf file and make the header red. Finally, I will return the formatted pdf file.
summary: Task analysis for formatting the excel document.
